EmailTemplate.name: Public Churches SF E-mail Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up Info - Community Partnership with Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, <?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
As we approach the end of the year, I was thinking about you, and I know that Community and Fellowship are stepping stones that strengthen the foundation of a Church. At Office Depot, we understand the importance of creating a welcoming environment, which is why we thoughtfully bring together everything needed to present a gathering area that is inviting and hospitable.
Your relationship with Office Depot gives you access to premium coffee, the latest cash-management technology, and all of the items in-between to help you serve your congregation and visitors.
Please see the attachment that shows several ways that weâ€™ve been able to help churches in the past. If you are interested, please take a picture of your current coffee set-up and send it to me. I would love to give you a customized coffee solution for your organization.
As always, thank you for being a loyal Office Depot customer and for allowing me to help you build your community.
Best Regards,
{!User.Name}
Business Account Manager |Inside Sales BSD
9501 Amberglen Blvd., Building H, Suite 200, Austin, TX 78729
Tel: 855-337-6811 Ext: {!User.ISO_Extension__c} | Fax: 561.438.9719 | {!User.Email}
<?xml:namespace prefix = v ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml" />
